plot: A highly successful music producer hopes to instill values in his stepsons, but they have their mother (and his trophy wife) in the palm of their hands.
plot_en: A highly successful music producer hopes to instill values in his stepsons, but they have their mother (and his trophy wife) in the palm of their hands.
plot_es: A highly successful music producer hopes to instill values in his stepsons, but they have their mother (and his trophy wife) in the palm of their hands.
title: The Princes of Malibu
